title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 126.3 - Appeals without transcript
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 126.3 - Appeals without transcript

State Regulations

An appeal without transcript may be submitted only when the
only issue is the appropriateness of the penalty imposed. When an appeal is so
submitted, the decision of the board shall be final. Such appeal shall be
deemed fully submitted when filed; provided, however, that when a transcript be
later submitted, the provisions of section
126.2
(e) of this

Part shall then determine the date of final submission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
126.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
